title: Machine Learning with Python
author: Willi Richert
description: Expand your knowledge of Python data with the power of machine learning with this free and full-featured guide. Find out how to use cutting-edge Python machine learning algorithms to reveal the hidden insight in your data. You'll learn how to build machine learning for text, images, and sounds with free open-source tools and libraries.

title: Learn to Program
author: Chris Pine
description: A Place to Start for the Future Programmer
